import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./chatapp.css"; import PersonIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Person'; import PersonAddIcon from '@mui/icons-material/PersonAdd'; import SendIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Send'; import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid'; const Chatapp: React.FC = () => { const uniqueId = uuidv4(); const [idViewed, setIdViewed] = useState(false); return (
setIdViewed(!idViewed)} style={{ fontSize: 40, color: '#000000ff' }} />
Hello! How are you?
I'm good, thanks! How about you?
